Label: What is the unit for plot area?
What is your plot area in hectare?
What is the unit for subplot area?
What is your subplot area in hectare?
Year of measurement
helpText: if your Year is decimal, leave as "none" and match it to "Date of measurement"

Label: What is your year of measurement?
Day of measurement
helpText: different than date, see Date

Label: What is your date format?
helpText: e.g. 2016-09-14 would be yyyy-mm-dd, 9/14/2016 would be mm/dd/yyyy, 2016.703 would be decimal and 17058 woulbe numeric (number of days since 1970-01-01)

Label: Tree tag
helpText: identifiers at the plot level. It can be the same as tree ID if you have only one plot.
Description: Tree unique identifiers, matching the tag number in the field.

Label: Tree ID
helpText: unique tree identifier in the entire dataset
Description: Tree unique identifiers. This was automatically generated if it was not provided in the input data (using plot and tree tag information).

Label: Stem ID
helpText: stem unique identifier within the tree or at the plot level

Label: Measure ID
helpText: if you measured more than one Diameter per tree
Description: measure unique identifier if you had more than one measure per stem per year

Label: Life status
helpText: where you say the tree is dead or alive
Description: Logical: TRUE if tree was alive, FALSE if it was dead

Label: Which of your status(es) represent a LIVE tree?
DBH
helpText: usually at breast heigh but see HOM or POM

Label: BD
helpText: basal diameter

Label: Circumference
helpText: circumference of the tree

Label: What is your basal circumference unit?
HOM
helpText: height of diameter measurement, as numeric value

Label: POM
helpText: point of diameter measurement, as a code
Description: Code for point of measurement of tree diameter

Label: Basal HOM
helpText: height of basal diameter measurement, as numeric value
Description: Height of measurement of basal diameter

Label: Basal POM
helpText: point of basal diameter measurement, as a code
Description: Code for point of measurement of basal diameter

Label: What is your Basal POM unit?
What is your tree height unit?
Tree X euclidean position in plot
helpText: position of the tree relative to the Southwestern corner of the plot, in meters
Description: Tree X euclidean position in plot

Label: Tree Y euclidean position in plot
helpText: position of the tree relative to the Southwestern corner of the plot, in meters
Description: Tree Y euclidean position in plot

Label: Tree X euclidean position in SUBplot
helpText: position of the tree relative to the Southwestern corner of the SUBplot, in meters
Description: Tree X euclidean position in subplot

Label: Tree Y euclidean position in SUBplot
helpText: position of the tree relative to the Southwestern corner of the SUBplot, in meters
Description: Tree Y euclidean position in subplot

Label: Scientific name
helpText: Latin binomial

Label: Deepest taxonomic level for which full identification is known
Description: Deepest taxonomic level for which full identification is known

Label: Taxonomic authority for the ID level
Description: Taxonomic authority for the ID level

Label: Commercial species indicator
Description: Logical: TRUE if species is considered commercial, FALSE if not

Label: Which of the following(s) indicate a commercial species?
Life form
helpText: tree/palm/liana/bamboo?

Label: Logging treatment
helpText: CL/RIL/control/..
